跢字的基本解释

跢
dài
跌倒。

跢
duò
小孩行走的样子。

跢
duō
携幼儿行走。

跢
chí
古同“踟”。

跢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《廣韻》丁佐切，去箇，端。］
(1)顿脚。
(2)犹刺。
[②]［chí］
［《集韻》陳知切，平支，澄。］
［《廣韻》陟栗切，入質，至。］
徘徊不前貌。

跢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　跢； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1224第18
【廣韻】【集韻】?當蓋切，音帶。【玉篇】倒也。【揚子·方言】跌蹷也。【註】江東言跢。　又【廣韻】【正韻】丁佐切【集韻】丁賀切，?音?。小兒行也。又【集韻】當何切，音多。攜幼行也。　又?知切，音馳。【博雅】蹢䠱，跢跦也。　又【集韻】陟栗切，音窒。義同。

跢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
跢字的起名意思

暂无。

Stomp
Basic explanation of words
Stomp
dài
Fall down.
Stomp
duò
The way the child walks.
Stomp
duō
Walk with the baby.
Stomp
chí
Gu Tong "stuck".
Stomp
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Guangyun" Ding Zuoqie, go to Xie, end. ]
(1) Pause the foot.
(2) Still thorns.
[②]［chí］
["Ji Yun" Chen Zhiqie, flat branch, clear. ]
["Guang Yun" Zhi Li cut, into the quality, to. ]
Wandering around.
Stomp
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　跺; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1224 Page 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Dang cover cut, soundtrack. [Jade articles] Not too bad. 【Yangtze Dialect】Fallen. [Note] Jiang Dongyan stomped.　[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ding Zuoqie [Ji Yun] Ding Heqie,? Yin?. It's okay for children. Also 【Jiyun】When to cut, there are many sounds. Bring the young line also.　 Again? Zhiqie, Yinchi. 【Bo Ya】Walking, stomping.　 [Ji Yun] Zhi Li cut, sound choked. The same meaning.
